emotecraft.options.keybind: Set a custom key to play the selected emote
emotecraft.options.fastmenu: Select an emote than click to add to the fast menu. Right click to clear
emotecraft.sure2:
An other emote has this keybind.
Do you want to reset that and set the key to this?
emotecraft.otherconfig.validate.tooltip: Only for PvP worlds, where somebody want to cheat. It creates a limitation, make impossible to play some emotes
